name: Forge Time !
description:
Forge Time ! is a Tryzmapoem Inc. game made on Hackerspace Game Jam
(part of Global Game Jam 2020).

You are Blacksmith. You have tasks to do -> Repair as much as you can. For completing task in given time, there is cash reward. For failing - welp, cash fee to pay.


02.02.2020 : Game Jam version. Only one type of weapon to repair (consisting of 3 weapon's part) and only two tasks to do.



Code | 2D Graphics | Music | Sounds : Piotr Rudnicki (Ten Square Games)
3D assets : 3DForge
